00041 #define public_static_method    public: static 
00042 #define public_variable         public: 
00043 #define public_static_variable  public: static
00044 #define public_constructor      public: 
00045 #define private_method          private: virtual 
00046 #define private_static_method   private: static

00048 #define private_static_variable private: static

00051 // for catching potential memory problems
00052 #define catchMalloc(__variable, __objName) if(__variable == 0) { printf("ERROR: malloc() failed for %s\n", __objName); }
00053 #define catchNilObjectException(__variable, __action) if(__variable == 0) { __action; }
00054 #define newStatic(objectName, variableName) namespace objectName##$static { variableName; }
00055 #define externStatic(objectName, variableName) namespace objectName##$static { extern variableName; }
00056 #define getStatic(objectName, variableName) objectName##$static::variableName

00063 // random number generation for Math.random()
00064 #define N 624
00065 #define M 397
00066 #define MATRIX_A 0x9908b0dfUL   /* constant vector a */
00067 #define UPPER_MASK 0x80000000UL /* most significant w-r bits */
00068 #define LOWER_MASK 0x7fffffffUL /* least significant r bits */
00069 extern maven_long mt[N]; /* the array for the state vector  */
00070 extern maven_int mti; /* mti==N+1 means mt[N] is not initialized */
